text: Juna manisaharula'i je jati dhana sampatti allahale aphno krpale pradana gareko cha, tinale tyasama kanjusyayila'i aphno hakama ramro nathanun baru (tyo) tinako nimti ahitakara cha. Tiniharule juna dhanama kanjusi gardachan kiyamatako dina tyasako tauka (pangra) pahira'ine chan. Akasaharu ra prthviko verasatako vastavika malika allaha nai ho. Ra juna kriyakalapa timile gardachau, allahala'i ramri thaha cha
